title: TOPGREENER Digital Dimmer Light Switch for 200W Dimmable LED/CFL Lights, Single Pole Led Slide Dimmer Switch, Neutral Wire Not Required, Wall Plate Included, UL Listed, TGDS1-W-6PCS, White,6 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #89,651 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #172 in Dimmer Switches       #172 in Dimmer Switches

feature_bullets: Dim LED lights to create the perfect ambiance with the Kalide dimmer wall switch; supported by major-brand light bulbs from GE, Cree, Philips, Sylvania, Lithonia, Amazon Basics, EcoSmart, and more; not compatible with smart lighting fixtures
Features an easy-to-use slider for full-range dimming; to turn the light OFF, move the slider all the way down until it clicks
Side dial allows for user-friendly fine-tuning controls; adjust the lowest dimming level to stop light bulbs from flickering

Made of Polycarbonate Thermoplastic material to provide the durability and resilience needed to withstand hard impacts and heavy force; heat & fade resistance to temperatures over 100Â° to prevent discoloration; flammability UL94; V2 rating
White color; 200W LED/CFL; 600W incandescent/halogen; compatible with dimmable light bulbs only; single pole; 18-#12 AWG (copper only); neutral wire not required;

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch easy to install with clear instructions and appreciate its stylish design. The dimming ability and functionality receive mixed reviews - while some say it works well with LED recessed lights, others report it doesn't work with LED bulbs. Moreover, the flickering issue and build quality are concerns, with customers noting it's not well made and stops working after a few months. Additionally, the value for money receives mixed feedback, with some praising the affordable price while others criticize the poor quality.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe simplicity control  TOPGREENER Digital Dimmer Light Switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy Installation: Installing this dimmer switch was straightforward. It comes with clear instructions, and if you're comfortable with basic electrical work, you should have no trouble installing it. Just make sure to turn off the power before installation.Compatibility: I appreciate that this dimmer switch is designed to work with both LED and CFL lights. It provides smooth and flicker-free dimming, allowing you to set the perfect lighting ambiance for any occasion. Whether you want bright task lighting or a cozy, dimmed atmosphere, this switch delivers.Digital Control: The digital display and touch-sensitive buttons make it easy to set the desired brightness level precisely. You can easily adjust the lighting to your preference, and the switch remembers your last setting when turned off and on again.Single Pole: This dimmer switch is designed for single-pole applications, which is the most common setup in residential spaces. It's perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, dining rooms, or any room where you want versatile lighting control.Stylish Design: The switch itself has a modern and minimalist design that blends seamlessly with most decor styles. It doesn't look out of place on your wall, and the LED display adds a touch of sophistication.Reliability: I've been using this dimmer switch for a few months now, and it has been extremely reliable. I haven't experienced any flickering or buzzing, and it operates quietly.Energy Savings: Dimming your lights not only creates a pleasant atmosphere but also helps you save energy and extend the lifespan of your bulbs. This switch is energy-efficient, which is a bonus for eco-conscious homeowners.In summary, the TOPGREENER Digital Dimmer Light Switch is an excellent addition to any home with LED or CFL lighting. Its ease of installation, compatibility, precise digital control, and reliability make it a top choice for those looking to enhance their lighting experience. I highly recommend it for anyone seeking an affordable and efficient dimmer switch.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsDefinitely perfect for my application
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: My house was custom-built for me 13 years ago.  I finally decided to install a ceiling fan in a guest bedroom that is rather small.  The home builder made a small error in that his electrician installed a 3-gang wall switch electrical junction box in this bedroom instead of a 2-gang box.  One of the switches is the recessed ceiling lights, leaving the other two positions for the ceiling fan.  Now everybody knows that ceiling fan switches are all combination switches whereby one switch has controls for both the light and the fan.  This presents a cosmetic problem for the guest bedroom because had I used the combination wall switch, then the third position within the electrical box would either have to be a switch that does nothing, or a blank flat insert (I cannot explain that any better).  Over these past 13 years, I just had two switches there that did nothing.  But installing the ceiling fan would finally complete the room, so to solve the wall switch problem, I looked for a separate light dimmer switch and fan dimmer switch.  I found these by TOPGREENER.  I am uploading an identical review for the other switch.  I am very happy with both products.  Both were easy to install, work correctly, feel good to click through the various detents, and are visually appealing.  Recommend !

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Worked as advertised. Upon checking the reviews, some said the dimmers caused humming. We haven't noticed any humming or lights flickering.

customer_reviews.review_snippet: The cover that goes over the timer settings broke after a couple months. Probably wouldnt buy again.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Well built.Smooth slider motion.Nice click at the bottom, to turn completely off.Minimum brightness can be adjusted, just before this click.Matches the appearance of their Fan Speed Controller (TGFS3)Graphics embossed into the body is a nice touch.
